### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of steam engine not found, boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) and offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5) and position(x=-11.5, y=26.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)
Consists of steam engine not found, boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0) 

### Pipe group at position(x=1.5, y=-6.5)
Consists of pipe-group at position(x=1.5, y=-6.5), pipe-group at position(x=3.5, y=-2.5) and pipe-group at position(x=-5.5, y=25.5)

### Electricity distribution at position(x=5.9, y=1.1)
Consists of electricity-group at position(x=5.9, y=1.1) with small-electric-pole at position(x=3.5, y=0.5), small-electric-pole at position(x=3.5, y=2.5) and other poles

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into full inventory
- Check the inventory of the entity before attempting to insert items
- Ensure that the entity has enough space to hold the items being inserted

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are compatible and can be connected
- Check the positions and connections of the entities before attempting to connect them

### Errors when getting entities
- Ensure that the entity exists on the map before attempting to get it
- Check the prototype and position of the entity before attempting to get it

### Errors when using API
- Check the API documentation for the correct usage and parameters
- Ensure that the API call is valid and correctly formatted before attempting to use it
